member.name: T:Rackspace.RackspaceNet
member.summary: A static container for global configuration settings affecting Rackspace.NET behavior.

member.name: F:Rackspace.RackspaceNet.Configuration
member.summary:
Global configuration which affects OpenStack.NET's behavior.
Modify using .

member.name: M:Rackspace.RackspaceNet.Configure(System.Action{Flurl.Http.Configuration.FlurlHttpConfigurationOptions},System.Action{Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings},System.Action{Rackspace.RackspaceNetConfigurationOptions})
member.summary:
Provides thread-safe accesss to Rackspace.NET's global configuration options.
Can only be called once at application start-up, before instantiating any Rackspace.NET objects.
member.param: Addtional configuration of Flurl's global settings .
Additional configuration of Json.NET's global settings .
Additional configuration of Rackspace.NET's global settings.

member.name: T:Rackspace.RackspaceNet.Tracing
member.summary: Provides global point for programmatically configuraing tracing

member.name: F:Rackspace.RackspaceNet.Tracing.Http
member.summary:
Trace source for all HTTP requests. Default level is Error.
In your app or web.config the trace soruce name is "Flurl.Http".

member.summary:
A set of properties that affect the SDK's behavior.
Generally set via the static method.

member.summary: Clear all custom global options and set default values.

member.name: T:Rackspace.CloudNetworks.v2.Network
member.summary:
Represents a network resource of the .

member.name: T:Rackspace.Testing.HttpTest
member.summary:
Use this instead of Flurl.Http.Testing.HttpTest when writing unit tests against the Rackspace APIs.
This extends Flurl's the appropriate HttpMessageHandler in unit tests. If you use the default HttpTest, then any tests which rely upon authentication handling (e.g retrying a request when a token expires) will fail.
